Reviews.Title: Works well for the price.
Reviews.Author: Robert Garner
Reviews.Content: Can see upwards of 150 in the dark of night. The audio starts getting distorted if your audience is sitting over 80 feet away and talking in a light noise area at normal conversation volume.I would say buy the 100ft cord and power supply offered under the "people buy this product with" list. This comes with no cords or anything but when combined with the cords is cheaper than buying the camera with the cords.It's relatively versatile and you can mount it anywhere. You may want to consider buying some separate screws to mount it though, the ones it came with didn't seems very long-lasting so i bought a few self-tapping metal screws.As described: this product works great outside, even in the summer heat and frigid winters. I live in California so this camera has been exposed to 5 degrees F and also 104 degrees F and it still functions properly.

Reviews.Title: Ok for the price
Reviews.Author: NotSoSlow
Reviews.Content: This camera performs well in the dark within 10'  Generally these lower dollar cameras has a poor mount design but this one is solid...

Reviews.Title: Fantastic deal, much better than anticipated
Reviews.Author: Jedekiah Cazier "cazbro"
Reviews.Content: This camera is pretty good for the outside, actually. I have bought several for my business and was amazed that it would see so well in almost total sales, yet the little lights would hardly glow (perfect, actually). The distance is about 60 feet is awesome, then dropping from there. I have been putting these in place of the expensive "name-brand" cameras that the installer originally put in. These are way better, cheaper, and have already lasted longer than the others.Con-  the mount is cheap and tricky, but once it's set, it's set. I used the existing one for most of mine. You can actually get one of those big enclosures for this if you wanted, as the screw holes are there.Note- I've actually purchased A TON of cameras and gear from these guys from here and eBay. Never disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Audio Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Mark Kenworthy
Reviews.Content: Great product, works very well, I purchased it to document behavier from a disgruntal neighbor.  I connected it to a standard VCR. AAAAAA +++++++ Thank You

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Lance Clauser Marine Service
Reviews.Content: The images seem clear and the night vision is better than some others I bought. The microphone is very sensitive. During initial setup and testing we had placed it about 5 feet from a wall clock and we could hear the ticking from the clock.

Reviews.Title: Poor product. Totally unsatisfactory durability.
Reviews.Author: stugacz "stugacz"
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 of these cameras in the summer of 2012. They all worked for a while. Suddenly, in July of 1013 3 of the 4 cameras simply quit working with no warning. I am now left with one of the original cameras and have no idea when it will cease to function. Having said that, I am not too confident of it lasting much longer based on how soon the three identical companion cameras simply died. Do not purchase this product.When I reported this issue to the vendor this was their response:"We offer 30 days return, replacement and 90 days repair warranty, since your item was purchased more than 30 days ago, so we are not able to do the return for you any more.Best regardsCustomer service"

Reviews.Title: Decent piece of equipment
Reviews.Author: Jwill
Reviews.Content: Well, overall this is a pretty good camera. It has it's pro's and con's but don't they all? It has good night vision even in total darkness at least 40' .

Reviews.Title: Infrared doesn't work well at all
Reviews.Author: LG
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of the cameras and the all have the same results with the infrared.  I have all of them set inside the house.  Works fine in the day but at night with no ambient light, the camera picks up nothing.  I may barely see a pixelated white blob that appeared to be part of my couch but that's it.  I have bought cameras in the $50 range that works much better in the dark.  I think I'll go back to paying a little more for the cameras.  I had bought the camera mostly for the sound feature and assumed the infrared would work like the other videosecu cameras that I have.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu day night security camera
Reviews.Author: Gene Wade
Reviews.Content: installed the  day after i got it as you promised i would .Got it on my T.V  and already caught some one  stealing just a 1.00  bag of ice , yes i said a 7lb bag of ice for a 1.00

Reviews.Title: video secure
Reviews.Author: Salaiza
Reviews.Content: Cameras are great for night vision. During the day more color could be added for a better quality.  I would recommend this product.  The screws need to be better quality as they break so easily.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Day Night Infrared Audio Security Camera Built-in Microphone for CCTV Home Surveillance DVR System with Free Warning S
Reviews.Author: Geego David "GR"
Reviews.Content: The Main problem I found with this camera was the INSTALLATION process: it would've been much easier to install, if the camera's AV RCA cables were not hard wired to the back of the camera.. I choose to install this camera OUTDOORS above my window, based on my main reason for buying it. If the RCA cables going to the camera were not "hardwired" directly to it's back. It would not have taken me 4 hours to complete this simple installation; the "hard wired" RCA AV cables presented much lack of  maneuverability in handling the cables from the camera through a drilled hole, thus making the whole installation an awkward time consuming experience, among other added unrelated issues.  I had to do more drilling than expected through a 10 inch thick window frame, which is constructed with a combination of hard wood, and concrete in order to fish the camera's RCA AV cables through that hole to the inside my house, the window frame situation ,I am NOT blaming on the hard wired camera design totally, but it figured into the overall problem to a great degree nonetheless. I am assuming most of you guys that gave this camera 5 stars, have bought it  mainly for INDOORS use,since such installation should take 15 minutes, and the maximum time approximately half an hour....but in my "outdoor" installation scenario, the AV RCA cables being "irremovable," from the camera posed awkward problems,in addition to unrelated problems drilling a hole to fish the cable through a 10 inch thick window frame "end to end," the bulky RCA cables tied to the fairly large camera, posed many problems. I mistakenly thought after finally completed creating the initial hole in the window frame that the bulk of the "installation, was done; but  that was just the beginning, since there were much more "re drilling" done to "widen" the hole so that the bulky RCA cables that kept getting tangled up half way through the length of the hole in the window frame,required re-drilling" to widen the hole, so I drilled again, and again, until I had a gaping hole of about 1.5 inches that was wide enough to fairly "maneuver" the awkwardly designed camera and it's bulky attached RCA AV cables through the hole into my house,thus connecting them to the monitor... The installation thereafter was completed within 15 minutes...The camera's AV video output is mediocre ,on the grainy side, but good enough for the price, however, I would NEVER buy any outdoor camera with the video-audio RCA cables "HARD WIRED TO THE CAMERA"  ever again.

Reviews.Title: Throw 30 bucks in the trash
Reviews.Author: Dixiepartsman
Reviews.Content: Eliminate the middleman and just burn 30 dollars. I bought 2 of these because number one I wanted a better resolution than the 420tvl that my system came with and two I wanted audio. One of these arrived DOA, wouldn't keep a video connection and the other is nowhere near as clear as the Swann 580 420tvl that I had. The night vision is TERRIBLE! All I can see are "ghosts" shadows floating around. Save your money.

Reviews.Title: Day/night camera with audio
Reviews.Author: Patf
Reviews.Content: Dont buy this camera even at this price ($32.)The mounts are crap and fall right out of the camera. The color or lack there of is just horrible! I tried to give this product no stars but they said I had to so.

Reviews.Title: vid camera day/night with mic
Reviews.Author: Kevin "€x°¶}u$"
Reviews.Content: Camera shows picture upclose, as if it were in zoom mode. I can see so much more details upclose, very pleased.During the day light hours the color and picture are crisp and clear; but night time hours it loses all color turning picture into blk and white only. But the night vision is great! No outside light needed and can see up to 100' ft so clearly as if there were a light on.I have not tinkered with the audio portion yet so can not speak about that.So if you want a (BAM) In your face view with great night vision then this is the camera for you. Plan to order a few more and pleased with the low price camera is listed at.

Reviews.Title: Buy a 2nd,your going to need it.
Reviews.Author: John L "John L"
Reviews.Content: Bought this in 5/23/12.Stopped working in 9/12.I bought three VideoSecu cameras,two died within six months.The other has lasted1yr and 7 months.I bought my forth camera 6 weeks ago, but that one is another brand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Anthony Araya
Reviews.Content: I just replaced one of my DVR cameras with this one. The difference is literally night and day. The day time recordings are much more true color and the night recording is SO much clearer. The difference is painfully clear the moment you look at it.

Reviews.Title: The sad truth about the future.
Reviews.Author: Russell A. Comer
Reviews.Content: Camera works fine, colors are washed out a tad. night illumination is high and will white out the subject when too close but has excellent range. Microphone is clear and sensitive, I use this one at the front entrance but considering a better resolution camera, looking for camcorder quality picture.  I'm using an old camera wire of 100' so power wise I'm using 12v 1000ma.Would buy more, only for indoor or under eve outside. VideoSecu has done me well, so I'll be back here for more.Unfortunately times are coming that evidence will be the only thing you will be able to depend upon instead of trust.  In hard times to come expect a rise in crime as you should thefts of gasoline to increase when gas prices get higher.Situation; You come home and to your surprise (not theirs because you have such a predictable routine) your house has been broke into. The thief used a method called bumping, using a standard key the thief can tap the key into your lock and turn it, available online already made to work your front door. The thief can simply be found if the dust the scene (highly unlikely they will unless a murder has happened) and run the prints in their data base. IF this thief is in the data base, you will find out later that he was in the area earlier that week knocking on doors looking to mow your yard, or preach to you about Jesus. Though his stuff that hasn't been sold or swapped LOOKS like yours, you will have to provide serial numbers and simply not just receipts. Maybe you can depend on your home owners insurance to come through, and later won't raise your rates or adjust your premium.You have to understand that most break ins or home invasion (occupied or not) happen during the day because it looks less suspicious, and everybody is at work.In the security camera setup, have a dummy recorder wired as such and powered etc. NEVER let the actually recorder be located because you will lose it!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Norman Paperman "NWhippie"
Reviews.Content: I've purchased a few add-ons to my original four Zmodo cameras and this is by far the worst. Mount is flimsy and only hits about a thread and a half in so a slight bump will strip it out. Definitely not weatherproof. There are several small pinholes in the back that are not covered by the short sunshade. The shade is adjustable back and forth but it's not long enough to get both ends. Any wind during rain will put water all up inside it's works. The multi-wire coming out the back is of small gauge and feels like it would easily break down over time in the weather and pull apart. It also is right in the middle of the back which interferes with certain positions of the mount, All of these things are tolerable/fixable in certain situations but the reason this one went back was that even by itself on an eight camera plug, it spent up to several minutes clicking back and forth in the morning as it came out of IR/BW mode into color mode. This makes the camera unusable during this time. Seems to be a light sensor deal and not power related. I don't know, I'm not an expert, just the lowly consumer who stupidly thinks if it's on Amazon, it's of good quality. Not true and you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: not the same as advertized
Reviews.Author: Dennis Ashland
Reviews.Content: It is not the same camera listed as whether proof  this camera is not weather proof you wanted to know what was not right

Reviews.Title: the camera stop..
Reviews.Author: Alexandre Sancho Issa
Reviews.Content: I bought this câmera in september 2013 and I installed in february 2014. The camera didn't worked well and now (march 7th) stopped to work.I want to change, Is it possible?

Reviews.Title: Not an Outdoor Camera
Reviews.Author: Cycle4fun
Reviews.Content: I installed this camera above my driveway and it worked really great for a couple weeks but now it is full of water.  Definitely not an outdoor camera.

Reviews.Title: If you don't mind blurry pic and have 24 hrs of light it's ok
Reviews.Author: t96talon
Reviews.Content: Picture is blurry  you can make shapes out in day time if it's not cutting on and off (watching it blink on and off right now )  switch from day to night flashes on and off and at night all you can see is light splotches past 5 feet  this was supposed to be better than the zmodo cameras that came with the cheapest dvr but it is much worse

Reviews.Title: Audio doesn't work:(
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Bouchard
Reviews.Content: I bought this to add audio to my existing system, and the camera's audio doesn't work right out of the box:( I'm sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera 20 Times better than Box Sets
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My See Security system I purchased years ago was not clear and hard to hear what people were saying.  Ordered this camera, and its like someone cleaned a filthy, dirty window.  This camera is awesome and is not kidding, 20 time better than what comes in those box sets from See and Swann.  For 29.00 dollars, I wish I had ordered this camera 4 years ago.  The camera plugged into my existing Sound and Video plugs, so it took me 5 minutes to remove the old camera, and install the new one!  What a difference you (camera) made in our life.  The biggest benefit is you can easily tell who the folks are and its extremely sharp!  Folks don't want to go messing with stuff in my yard!  I ordered another camera, and will love the reception in my back yard!  I am really happy with the price, the quality, and what a difference what we see on the monitor!  It really is un believable!

Reviews.Title: Works In Pitch Black
Reviews.Author: MWCraft
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace one of the default Swann cameras that came with my dvr system.  The Swann cameras work fine in other locations where there is just a little ambient light to help them out but, inside my garage (with all the lights off at night) all I would get was a pitch black image.This camera, however, has illuminated the scene and I get a good nightvision view of the goings on.  I purchased a 100ft VideSecu cable (with audio) to go along with this and have also been pleased with that.  I have not enabled audio on this camera so I cannot speak to how well that works or sounds.

Reviews.Title: Poor night vision
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Thought this would be a little better than the cameras that came with my Zmodo system.  Not so.  The Zmodo cameras work well with LED motion lights and show color at night in areas of visible light.  This camera switches to night mode when it's even a little dark and all you see is black and white.  Also a lot of video 'noise' (for lack of a better word) at night.  The pavement in front of my house looks like it's alive.  Drives the motion detection crazy. I sent it back.

Reviews.Title: cant beat the price
Reviews.Author: Aaron L. Dunphy
Reviews.Content: For $25 this camera is well worth it. I bought two since the IR lighting is a whole let brighter than what I had with some freebie zmodo cams.  I will caution folks using this up close at night that the IR lighting tends to flood the image if you are not at least 20-30 feet away.  If you know that going in, I think its a great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: D.O.A.  DIDNT WORK
Reviews.Author: landloard
Reviews.Content: CAMERA LOOKS GOOD.  EASY TO HOOK UP, BUT IT DIDNT WORK.....  THE SOUND WORKED BUT NO PICTURE.  RETURNED IT.. AMAZON WAS GREAT....

Reviews.Title: video loss after 2 months
Reviews.Author: Anthony Chio
Reviews.Content: I had problems with camera with video loss after 2 months,and put it on shelf but did not return (did not have original boxes)then replaced with another  brand which has had no problems

Reviews.Title: Don't waist you time or money on these cheap cameras
Reviews.Author: Rene D. Kuegel
Reviews.Content: got one of these at first and it had a short and the microphone didn't work. I sent back for replacement and got two thinking surely the short was a fluke. Both of the new ones had shorts and microphones didn't work. I guess the old adage "you get what you pay for it true" I am getting the more expensive cameras that I know for sure work!

Reviews.Title: Worst Camera Ever
Reviews.Author: Seano
Reviews.Content: Okay - during the day, not so bad. But at NIGHT?! Worthless... Just an image that looks like a negative. Grainy, bleached-out picture. Not good for security, huh?GARBAGE - Would NEVER buy again.

Reviews.Title: Works ok, but if you want constant color.....
Reviews.Author: Richard A
Reviews.Content: I purchased this video camera to place in the front of my apartment door, being there's been lots of strangers entering my building; it's okay, but if it's placed within an area where there's constant light ( such as in my apartment hall way ), don't expect it to be in color...pretty good camera.  Cons : the microphone IS very scratchy, and will pick up very far away sounds, but not clearly

Reviews.Title: I received what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Mariusz Rakowski
Reviews.Content: I received what I expected, brand new, I am very happy with the product and I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: reeverdawg
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I have bought.  The Night  Vision and sound are high quality.  For the actual cost, I wish would have bought two more!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy for the money
Reviews.Author: R.J.Camera
Reviews.Content: I originally used the mic but then relocated the camera to a farther distance that already had a non audio cable so I didn't use the mic very long

Reviews.Title: day and night vision
Reviews.Author: wrw48
Reviews.Content: very good security camera,very clear during daytime,very good color. at night it has a good range of clear picture between 50 and a 100 ft.

Reviews.Title: Will work for the right person
Reviews.Author: Audiophilereviewing
Reviews.Content: This camera is much larger than most similar security cameras. Also, the cheap plastic case doesn't seem strong like similar, metal, cameras. The color is below average.Most importantly... This is an RCA cabled camera! Not BNC! This should be stated in the description. This was a deal breaker for me.

Reviews.Title: Mistake to buy
Reviews.Author: green thumb
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these cameras. They work great during the day, but when they go into infra- red mode the all I get is lines. I bought another brand earlier and it works great day or night. Not Happy!

Reviews.Title: I don't like it
Reviews.Author: Gloria Hines
Reviews.Content: Night vision is very poor. Not sure why it blackout completely at night and has a good picture during the day.

Reviews.Title: Okay camera, not bad.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "vkwash"
Reviews.Content: This camera works well both at nighttime and daytime, but mine does need to be hooked directly to the power supply. Otherwise at nighttime the picture starts to roll.The picture quality is great! At nightime (when connected properly to the power supply) it looks like daytime, in only black and white though.Overall, it's a very good camera.

Reviews.Title: Failure to disclose Black and white camera, not color - Negative
Reviews.Author: John Elkins
Reviews.Content: This camera is good for day light conditions, but it is not a good night camera, and will require a light source for detection.  It is also a black and white camera, not a color, which is probably my fault for not reading the fine print.... on second thought, the title didn't mention it was color or black and white, so failure to disclose is my claim on this camera.  If you want a reasonably good day light camera, for relatively cheap, this will do the job.  It was shipped in a timely manner, though I wouldn't buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Microphone sound is scratchy
Reviews.Author: L. Anderson "Professor, CIS"
Reviews.Content: Just got this today and set it up on my Zmodo system for the audio. With one (included) adapter, works very nicely. Video is superior to my entry-level Zmodo. The audio is scratchy - but I'm working on it. The cable are 50% still in a roll and that may be a factor. Mount seems to be fairly robust.

Reviews.Title: 5 monhts and still works great
Reviews.Author: Marzizo "Best Value Impulse Shopper"
Reviews.Content: I Have this outside and it works great.. Video is clear during the day and great at night when up close.. I have it shooting about 25 feet and it'd definitely a bit grainy but very tolerable. If i can get 1 year out of it i'd be happy to buy another..

Reviews.Title: CAMERA NEEDS A 12V UNIVERSAL POWER ADAPTER
Reviews.Author: A. PARHAM
Reviews.Content: WHEN BUYING THIS CAMERA YOU NEED TO BUY A UNIVERSAL 12V POWER ADAPTER, BECAUSE DURING THE DAY TO NIGHT FOCUS CHANGE THE CAMERA WILL START ACTING UP. THIS UNIVERSAL 12V ADAPTER CAN ADJUST THE POWER LEVEL REQUIRED TO OPERATE NORMAL.

Reviews.Title: Hood camera quality to price ratio
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This unit preforms very good for a narrow field of view the picture quality is great and the microphone clean and clear.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: BPAYNE
Reviews.Content: Picture and sound quality is very good for the price.  The lens is not wide angled enough for the application I am using it for so I had to add a second camera.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: Dragon M.
Reviews.Content: I finally reached the CAMERA that perfectly right .... congratulations in the future I will visit you and make shopping business with you. thanks

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Ted
Reviews.Content: These are very strong IR lights. if your useing this in an average size room, DONT! its very bright on teh screen.

Reviews.Title: surveillance  cam
Reviews.Author: Norma Davis
Reviews.Content: mount makes camera a little less secure and picks up wind movement. . Decided to go with a different camera.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: BigJohn "Big John"
Reviews.Content: This camera is fine for general usage. It does what it is supposed to and does it quite well. Not bad at all.

Reviews.Title: Very good picture quality.
Reviews.Author: DeMarrio
Reviews.Content: I have to admit I am really impressed with the picture quality. I install this camera on my mother's side door she loves it. The bracket is quite hard to adjust and doesn't hold very well but other than that A +.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM WYSONG
Reviews.Content: no power supply or cables. good camera for the money.10 more words required to fill out this form. okay I got it.

Reviews.Title: sound is poor a lot of hum.
Reviews.Author: verna chadwick
Reviews.Content: video is  average, sound is poor a lot of hum, very hard to get  tight enough to lock camera into position, the ball and wing nut just wont  allow enough to get it tight. good for the money but thats all no  super bargain.

Reviews.Title: not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I thought the color was a little off compared to my q-see brand cameras. Also the mounting bracket is really cheap/ flimsy and not as adjustable as I would have liked. That being said it was like half the price.

Reviews.Title: great item for the price!
Reviews.Author: leigh221
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to upgrade one of my existing cameras that have low light capabilities. Wow, was I amazed once I connected this unit. Daylight resolution was much better and night visibility at a range of 65' was awesome.I will be purchasing a couple more to upgrade the rest of my cameras.Only complain I have is the thumb style adjustment knob on the back, it should come with a rubber washer instead of the thin plastic type washer.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: hector renk
Reviews.Content: All items in package were in good condition yet I question the durability of the equipment. Also came without a power adapter and av extensions. After purchasing these excluded items at a near by radio shack, turns out everything works the way it should. Good picture quality and audio. Infrared quality is also very good. Not a bad deal.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy Rivera
Reviews.Content: Camera is clear and you can see images clearly in the dark so it is worth the money I paid will purchase another camera for the back of the house service was fast it arrived in two days

Reviews.Title: videosecu day night infrared camera
Reviews.Author: Janet Lyons
Reviews.Content: Did look to see if it came with power supply.. It doesn't but lucky for me I had one one hand.  I have it going to my DVR and so far looks great. I don't see why it would not look good at night. I will be getting one more for my DVR.

Reviews.Title: Limited range
Reviews.Author: Advid
Reviews.Content: This color cam works best in the day. At night the range of the LEDs is limited to about 5 feet, I can see them glowing red about 20 feet away.  The weight of the camera tends to shift the focus gradually downwards after a few weeks. Night vision, as I know it, is only in shades of black and white. Audio can get a lot of static sometimes, when it's working it's pretty cool to listen.

Reviews.Title: videosecu
Reviews.Author: ribbons
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera for the price.  It has good sound and the quality of the picture is better than many of the much more expensive cameras

Reviews.Title: Camera was okay
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: O got home expecting to set up my new camera and when i opened the package their was just the camera so I then had to order a cable a LCD monitor and powers outlet but the camera works great if you have all of those things

Reviews.Title: stealth and secure
Reviews.Author: WlochDown3 "Ttt"
Reviews.Content: This is a great deal! !! We can hesr everything needed for a while. .. they are durable and have have a relatively workablr range of motion. . Just needs better depth perception- love the audio&text; message alerts!!

Reviews.Title: Camera is not working well
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: First of all anything green shows up as purple.  and I have to continuously turn off and back on just to get the pic to come into focus.  I bought two cameras from this company and both are showing purple instead of green.  I attempted to try and exchange but the only choice I was given buy Amazon is a full refund.  I have no choice but to suck it up or loose my cameras until I can get my refund and buy new ones

Reviews.Title: videosecu day night infrared audio security camera with built in microphone
Reviews.Author: LouieD
Reviews.Content: video and audio quality is better then expected and construction is sturdy enough to place anywhere without worrying about falling off or being blown away by high winds

Reviews.Title: Bad Ass Camera
Reviews.Author: hope hlock
Reviews.Content: picks up everything... not too impressed with microphone it dont pick up much sound but camera has awesome night vision

Reviews.Title: Cost effective camera with great range and video
Reviews.Author: Sheldon
Reviews.Content: This camera was bought to protect my home due to all of the radio equipment I have.  This camera offers fantastic color images during the day, and really crisp infrared images at night.  Very sleek and easy to conceal in most applications.  I recommend this product to any one.  For the price, You can't go wrong with this investment!

Reviews.Title: night vision
Reviews.Author: Jesse Trotter
Reviews.Content: this camera shows like daylight on the darkest of nights ,the video is stable and focused. just wish it had audio

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: DrDave
Reviews.Content: These perform well for the price. GREAT night lighting compared to higher priced cams. Don't expect hi-def quality though. They suit the average homeowners needs.

Reviews.Title: Worked OK for a while
Reviews.Author: Phillip J. Thames "serensky"
Reviews.Content: This was an OK camera for the price, but all the IR LED's burned out in the couple of months since I got it and now, it's totally useless for IR use. Buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: Cheap price Cheap Item
Reviews.Author: v35
Reviews.Content: I used this product for my convenience store. The image quality is with in range with most CCTV systems. One issue with the camera was sometimes it would skip frames. The image would sometimes jump on the screen and this can be very annoying if you're monitoring employees and customers. The mic doesn't pick up audio as clearly as other cameras I've own. Due to the frame skipping and the low performance of the mic I have to rate this item low. If there was no frame skipping I would rate this 3.5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras
Reviews.Author: michael p.
Reviews.Content: i love these cameras so much better in audio video and able to hook these directly to my tv and view them better

Reviews.Title: Quality an issue
Reviews.Author: William F. Dudley Jr.
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these, two either were DOA or failed instantly upon application of power.  I'm trying to figure out what the warrantee is so I can return the dead cameras.The remaining camera is OK.  Connectors are RCA for sound and video, by the way.  Power connector is "standard" barrel connector that most security cameras seem to use.

Reviews.Title: very good for the price
Reviews.Author: Dee Ann Phillips
Reviews.Content: Easy to hook up, if you have a basic knowledge  ( would not be  for a person with no experience)  works great day and night. I have several types of cameras on my system, from $1200 to this one at $25, good for close range (10-15 ft). I will be buying more as i need them. (I did buy from Amazon)  Very good value

Reviews.Title: Ok camera
Reviews.Author: Phil Dunson
Reviews.Content: Tried up close and distance. Still looks fuzzy. The LED'S at night are great. My other cameras pick up the light given off by the new camera. Really lights up the driveway. I would not recommend. Try a different replacement camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera and metal housing
Reviews.Author: Fabolous
Reviews.Content: I have purchased various cameras in the past and this one if by far the best one. Others stop working after a few months, but this one is still working just as it did when I first bought it. The metal housing is also a big plus considering other cameras are usually in cheap plastic that melts and warps with the sun. I will buy more of this camera and seller again.

Reviews.Title: The cameras picture is very clear and crisp
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Martinez
Reviews.Content: The camera has a clear and crisp picture, as for the sound it has too much background noise, so its hard to hear anything clearly I would not recommend the sound, going back to the picture quality it looks good but not very much of a wide view.Pros - Clear and crisp image qualityCons - Sound not that crisp, image does not capture a wide angle, and I could not see anything in the dark with this camera

Reviews.Title: It almost fell off the mount twice
Reviews.Author: Tech/Handy Guy 001
Reviews.Content: Good image quality but one flaw. The screw that holds it to the mount is too short and too flimsy.

Reviews.Title: CCTV Cameras
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I bought four camera to replace the camera lost during a thunder storm. There was a  bolt of lightning directly overhead. It didn't strike the house but we lost a lot of electronics not to mention the cameras. The cameras I purchased to replace the old ones are okay. The field of view is not as wide as I had before. Additionally if you have a small appliance in operation close by there is some interferance. I would not hesitate to purchase cameras from the same manufacturer in future. I would pay more attention to the details about the view they provide.

Reviews.Title: Wrong one.
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: I have a DVD system, not a DVR system. I tried to hook this up it would not work. There are "no instructions" which is not fun so I did not realize it was for a DVR system and tried to hook it up for many days in a row getting very angry. So now I am stuck with this and I am very unhappy about that. If they would have inserted instructions then I would have read that it was not for a DVD system and could have returned it and got my money back?? I did contact the company and they e-mailed me instructions and that was when I saw it would not work for me. I asked if I could send it back for my money and they said no so that is why I give it a one star. So I don't know if it is a good product or not.

ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night vision audio video CMOS security camera. NTSC signal system
36 IR illuminators for night vision. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Minimum Illumination: 0.0 Lux(with IR on)
Built-in audio microphone and mechanical IR-Cut filter switch. Metal body housing, mount and sun shade
Lens: 6.0mm. 520TVL high resolution. Connection Type: RCA audio & RCA video & 2.1 mm center positive power plugs
Power requires: 12V DC 500mA or above (sold separately). Bonus mounting bracket and surveillance warning sticker included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu CCTV Bullet Outdoor Security Camera 520TVL High Resolution Built-in Microphone IR-Cut Filter Infrared Day Night Vision Audio Video Camera for DVR Home Surveillance System with Bonus Warning Sticker (Black) CXU
